column4: In the Gnome Partition Editor i chose to create a new partition with an ext2 system and when i click apply it says "/dev/sdb2 is mounted; will not make a filesystem here!"
you dont want to be changing partitions on mounted filesystems
i have unmounted and then tried ot change its system but i get teh same message back
this is why i normally use a live cd and it gparted tools.
